title: SweeperVR
description: Minesweeper has finally come to Virtual Reality! Flag, count, and open cells in this fully 3D reinvention of the classic game.FeaturesView the entire minefield in cube view, or highlight an individual planeFully customizable minefield spawning parameters, with difficulty presetsDrag, drop, scale, and rotate the minefield to locate mines from any angleStandard game mechanics and timerProfessional mine-defusers and newbies alike will be able to enjoy the challenges and gameplay of SweeperVR!
